about.desc: I am a front-end engineer skilled in web development with a focus on TypeScript and the Next.js framework. In the long term, I aspire to become a knowledgeable individual who can effectively drive business-relevant outcomes through communication and manage a product development team. While technical depth is important, I also aim to grow into an engineering manager or product owner who comprehensively understands and considers the company's structure, design, various development fields, and strategic situations.

work.Heyseller_desc: Heyseller is a semi-automatic product upload service for overseas purchasing agents. It automates the uploading and management of products, allowing sellers to focus more on selling their products.
work.Coala_desc: Coala is a virtual asset community service. I developed the entire mobile web service, including functions such as viewing cryptocurrency information by exchange, and community features.
work.RocketPunch_desc: RocketPunch is a startup recruitment platform. I developed a premium subscription service that allows users to view the companies and people who visited their profiles.
